abilities.name: Leave It to Me
abilities.description: Leave It to MeAbilityBUFF Yin deals 120% increased damage when there are no allied heroes within 4 yards.

abilities.name: Charged Punch
abilities.description: Yin Lieh Charged PunchAbilityBurst Speed UpTypePhysical Skill Yin gains 60% extra Movement Speed (decays over 3s). Yin can launch an enhanced Basic Attack that deals 25(+100%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage within the duration. Upon hitting an enemy with the enhanced Basic Attack, Yin will throw another charged punch forward, dealing 360(+200%Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies in the path. Successfully throwing the charged punch reduces the skill's cooldown by 35%. 10.0 Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5 Level 6 Cooldown 10.0 9.4 8.8 8.2 7.6 7.0 Base Damage 25 40 55 70 85 100 Extra Damage 360 400 440 480 520 560 Frenzy StrikeAbilityBurstTypePhysical Skill Lieh smashes an area ahead up to 10 times, each smash dealing 130(+110%Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 75% for 0.2s. Lieh is immune to control effects for the duration, while the smashing speed will gradually increase. The first half of the attacks will automatically lock onto nearby enemies, while the latter half cannot change directions. Lieh can move or cast other skills during the latter half to cancel the skill early. 22.0 Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5 Level 6 Cooldown 22.0 20.8 19.6 18.4 17.2 16.0 Base Damage 130 140 150 160 170 180

abilities.name: Instant Blast
abilities.description: Yin Lieh Instant BlastAbilityBlink CCTypePhysical Skill/Blink Yin dashes forward, leaving a Golden Ring behind while dealing 75(+35%Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way. He gains 30% extra Damage Reduction for 4s if an enemy hero is hit. After 1s, the Golden Ring will catch up with Yin, dealing 150(+70%Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies it passes through and stunning them for 1s. 12.0 Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5 Level 6 Cooldown 12.0 11.4 10.8 10.2 9.6 9.0 Base Damage 75 90 105 120 135 150 Extra Damage 150 180 210 240 270 300 Instant BlastAbilityBlink CCTypePhysical Skill/Blink Lieh strikes a flying kick forward, leaving a Golden Ring behind while dealing 75(+35%Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way. Enemies hit will also be knocked back slightly. He gains 25% extra Damage Reduction for 4s if an enemy hero is hit. After 1s, the Golden Ring will catch up with Lieh, dealing 150(+70%Extra Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies it passes through and stunning them for 1s. 12.0 Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Level 5 Level 6 Cooldown 12.0 11.4 10.8 10.2 9.6 9.0 Base Damage 75 90 105 120 135 150 Extra Damage 150 180 210 240 270 300

abilities.name: My Turn
abilities.description: My TurnAbilityCC BUFFTypePhysical Skill After a short delay, Yin pulls an enemy hero (excluding pets and clones) into his domain for up to 8s and turns into Lieh. When in the domain, the two cannot be affected by other heroes' skills. Lieh has stronger skills and 20 extra Physical & Magic Defense that lasts 8s. The domain will end early if either of the two is killed. If Lieh successfully kills the enemy, he'll recover 20% Max HP, leave the domain with the cooldowns of Frenzy Strike and Instant Blast reset, and continue to fight as Lieh for 8s. If Yin fails to pull his target into his domain, the skill will enter a 3s cooldown. 60.0
